entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.2°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
